survey.title: The AI Amplifier Assessment
survey.subtitle: Discover how knowing your AI Archetype can make you more you.

catalyst.name: The Catalyst
catalyst.description: You don't just see the potentialâ€”you're ready to act on it. You have a clear vision, the authority to make it happen, and you're looking for the right partner to accelerate your AI journey.
traits: Clear on what you want to solve
Ready to invest in the right solution

champion.name: The Champion
champion.description: You see the opportunity and you're ready to advocate for it. You understand that bringing AI to your team requires buy-in, and you're prepared to make the case to leadership.
traits: Thinks about ROI and stakeholder value
Ready to pilot and prove the concept

strategist.name: The Strategist
strategist.description: You're thinking bigger than a single use case. You see how AI could transform your entire organization and you're mapping out the journey from quick wins to lasting competitive advantage.

builder.name: The Builder
builder.description: You want to get your hands dirty. Whether it's learning to build agents yourself or architecting complex solutions, you're drawn to the technical depth and the craft of building with AI.
traits: Interested in how things work under the hood

explorer.name: The Explorer
explorer.description: You're intrigued by what's possible and want to learn more. You're building your AI literacy and exploring how it might fit into your worldâ€”no rush, just genuine curiosity.

questions.text: What excites you most about AI?

options.text: Seeing how AI can solve real business problems
Understanding how to build agents and automations
Thinking about AI's impact on my industry
Just learning what's possible with AI today

questions.text: When you imagine using AI at work, what do you see?

options.text: Automating the tedious stuff so I can focus on what matters
Experimenting and discovering what's possible
Leading my team into the AI era
Building custom tools and workflows

questions.text: If AI could solve one thing for you tomorrow, how clear is that picture?

options.text: Crystal clearâ€”I know exactly what I'd pick
A few things come to mind
I'd need to think about it more
Honestly not sure yet

questions.text: What would it take to make AI happen in your world?

options.text: My decision and some budgetâ€”I can make it happen
I'd need to build the case and get buy-in
I'd figure it out myself with the right resources
Not sure it's the right time for me

questions.text: If you were to go deeper, what would be most valuable?

options.text: A focused session on my specific use case
An assessment of what's possible with my data/systems
A roadmap for AI across my team or org
Someone to build a custom solution with me

questions.text: How do you prefer to keep learning?

options.text: Joining a community of other learners
Self-paced tutorials and documentation
Just tinkering on my own projects
I'll circle back when the time is right

questions.text: When the path forward with AI is unclear, what do you reach for first?

options.text: I need more data, context, or analysis before I commit.
options.subtext: "I was there three thousand years ago..."

options.text: I talk to someone I trust.
options.subtext: "I can't carry it for you, but I can carry you."

options.text: I start moving and adjust as I go.
options.subtext: "A cage. To stay behind bars until use and old age accept them."

options.text: I go back to first principles.
options.subtext: "I would not take this thing, if it lay by the highway."

options.text: I look for a pattern I've seen before.
options.subtext: "Things that were... things that are... and some things that have not yet come to pass."

questions.text: When AI changes how your work gets done, your instinct is to...

options.text: Protect what matters, adapt selectively
Tear down and construct anew
Return to something older or truer
Synthesize old and new into something unprecedented
Pass the torch, enable others
Scout ahead, report back
Earth
Water
Fire
Air
Light
Space

scoring.description: Points determine avatar. Designed so paths lead to distinct outcomes.

catalyst.headline: Let's make it happen
catalyst.body: You've got the vision and the authority. Let's scope your first AI project and get it running. I'll bring the expertiseâ€”you bring the problem to solve.

champion.headline: Let's build your case
champion.body: You see the opportunityâ€”now you need to bring others along. I can help you build a compelling business case and pilot that proves the value.

strategist.headline: Let's map your AI transformation
strategist.body: You're thinking at the organizational levelâ€”that's where the real value is. Let's create a strategic roadmap from quick wins to lasting competitive advantage.

builder.headline: Thanks for taking the Assessment!
builder.body: I'm excited to follow your journey. Keep me posted on what you're buildingâ€”feel free to reach out and connect if I can help.

explorer.headline: Thanks for taking the Assessment!
explorer.body: Keep an eye on my site for inspiration as you continue exploring AI. When you're ready to go deeperâ€”I'll be here.

serviceTiers.note: Displayed to catalyst, champion, strategist avatars

tiers.name: Deep-Dive Session
tiers.description: 2-hour focused session on your specific use case

tiers.name: AI Readiness Audit
tiers.description: Assessment of your data, systems, and opportunities

tiers.name: Enablement Strategy
tiers.description: Custom AI roadmap for your organization
